content: these baby mitts are so adorable and fast what an easy and sweet gift the design was made using the leftover sweater yarn from the dream catcher baby blanket 1 and the dream catcher hat 2 but you could use any small amounts of sweater to make the mitts have fun 1 http //www spudandchloe com/blog/2010/04/dream-catcher-baby-blanket-free-pattern/ 2 http //www spudandchloe com/blog/2010/05/dream-catcher-hat-free-pattern/
